blocks.text: Source: mri_safety/MRISafety.xlsx. Two tabs transcribed: Unsafe and Safe.

items: Aneurysm Clips (unless card stating safe at 1.5T or 3.0T). Do not perform on HFO 1.0T. Unsafe Clips: Drake, Heifetz, Housepian, Lapp, Mayfield, McFadden, Pivot, Sundt-Kees, Vari-Angle, Yarsargil FD
Cardiac Pacemakers/Implantable Cardiac Defibrillators/Retained Pacer Wires New MR Compatible Pacemaker is safe under WellStar/Quantum protocol
Gastric Electrical Stimulators (unless card stating safe)
Phrenic/Vagus Nerve Stimulators (unless card stating safe)
Pill Cam Endoscopy Device (must verify excretion, check with KUB)
Steel Halo Vests (MR compatible vests are safe)

Cardiac Stents (wait 6-8 weeks, can image earlier at discretion of radiologist, can perform on 3.0T or 1.5T unless card says otherwise, avoid imaging on HFO 1.0T unless card has gauss limits up to 2200 g/cm)

Carotid, Peripheral, Intracranial and Biliary Stents (wait 6-8 weeks, can image earlier at discretion of radiologist, can perform on 3.0T or 1.5T unless card says otherwise, avoid imaging on HFO 1.0T unless card has gauss limits up to 2200 g/cm); Exception is Zenith AAA Endograft Stent, which is unsafe
Craniectomy/otomy Plates and Screws, Burhole Covers
Foley Catheters (unless temperature sensor than unsafe)
Ocular and Lens Implants (all Safe, except for Fatio Eyelid Spring/Wire Ocular, Martensiti SS Ocular, Troutman Magnetic Ocular Implant, Unitech Round Wire Eye Spring, Wide Angle IMT Lens Implant)

PDA, ASD, VSD, TAVR, and Patent Foramen Ovale Closure Devices (wait 6-8 weeks, can image earlier at discretion of radiologist and can image on 1.5T or 3.0T unless card states otherwise, avoid HFO 1.0T)
Pregnant Patients (Can image on 3.0T, 1.5T, 1.0T; Gadolinium only with radiologist approval)
Programmable Ventricular Shunts (provided set to be reprogrammed by neurosurgery)
Tattoos/Permanent Eyeliner (instruct patient on possible heating and terminate if patient discomfort)
Vascular Access Ports/Lines (must remove any guidewires prior to imaging)
Vena Cava Filters (wait 6-8 weeks, can image earlier at discretion of radiologist and can image on 3.0T, 1.5T or 1.0T)
Palatal System Implant for sleep disordered breathing (only at 1.5T with a max spatial gradient of 250 g/cm and max SAR 3.5 w/kg per 15 min per sequence)
Implantable ECG Monitoring System (only at 1.5T with max, spatial gradient of 250 g/cm and max SAR of 3.5 w/kg per 15 min per sequence)
